q1: When have the Swiss national team played their first match ever?
a1: Not sure what that even means
q2: Switzerland played their first world cup game vs Netherlands in 1934.
a2: How about first game in general, not just World Cup?
q3: The swiss team was founded in 1924 and they played at the Paris Summer Olympics that year. So certainly their first game was sometime in 1924.
a3: Did they win there first game in 1924?
q4: Not sure but they finished with a silver medal that year in Paris
a4: Yes they did finish with a silver medal
q5: Who is the best player for Switzerland?
a5: Hard to say, they have a pretty decent team all around, on both defense and offense.
